title: New Font Releases - Rockne,, Rasael, Agravain, Red Star
content:
We've released several new fonts in the past couple of months, so I thought I'd issue an update.

The most recent releases at [The Scriptorium](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015023616/http:/www.fontcraft.com/) include Rasael (a lovely script), Rockne (a somewhat psychedelic design), Agravain (a lovely pen hand font) and tomorrow we're releasing Red Star which is based on Soviet era poster lettering.

A little bit of everything. Come check out the new fonts and the updated site design at [fontcraft.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015023616/http:/www.fontcraft.com/).

Dave
author: dave nalle
